author: mmusich
body:
This reverts commit efdd57403ce6ace836e4f71bdf0d0bd0b5af78d3.
As per report at https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/18363#issuecomment-301009755, this should bring back the peak RSS consumption of step3 in wf 1001.0 to acceptable levels.
Will revert once an affordable solution to usage of stream DQM modules will be found.
title: [92X] Revert "review SiStripGains PCL configuration due to re-organization of classes in CalibTracker/SiStripChannelGain"
